text: Nigel Robert Haywood (born 17 March 1955) is a British diplomat. He was the British ambassador to Estonia from 2003 until 2008. He was also Governor of the Falkland Islands from 2010 until 2014. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Ambassadors of the United Kingdom Category:Living people Category:Governors of the Falkland Islands
title: Nigel Haywood
